name: ProtoGoblinDungeon
description:
Ultrashort game I made as a learning project. 

Story:

You're a goblin under the rule of a demon lord. One day, you had enough and decide to escape. However, nobody leaves the demon lord alive. Find the exit before your fellow goblins kill you!

Controls:

WASD or ←↑→↓: Take steps

Keep W pressed to run.

Q and E to strafe.

Combat:

Click the button to choose Rock, Paper, or Scissors.

Depending on the result, your attack will be stronger or weaker. This rule applies to enemies as well!

Credits:

Me, Emberger.

Buttons and Icon Sprite: Sprout lands ui pack at https://cupnooble.itch.io/sprout-lands-ui-pack .

Goblin Combat Sprite: https://immunitys.itch.io/goblin-sprite-pack

Music:

- Mining Town : Fantasy Towns Music Pack https://chrislsound.itch.io/fantasy-towns-music-pack

- Groove Dungeon: Retro and Electronic Music Pack at https://slaleky.itch.io/retro-and-electronic-music-pack
